rules_text:
[i]Dragon Steward[/i] – Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Crimson Cheer [/i]– {T}: Each creature you control that entered this turn gains haste and ward {2} until end of turn.
Partner with Clanne, Calm Steward [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Clanne into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
